about_the_game:
Daring Tales of Chivalry #01: A Knights Tale


A Fantasy Grounds Adventure module from Triple Ace Games

When two monks ask Sir David of Winchester and his entourage for help it seems like a righteous quest is beginning. But the monks of Muchelney Abbey lead a colorful and interesting life, and their problem is no earthly one.

To save the monks physical bodies, and maybe their eternal souls, the knights must deal with a divine servant who guards a holy weapon and a French raiding party attacking southern England before facing down the true monster.

A Knight’s Tale is a standalone adventure and comes complete with 6 pre-generated characters.

Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Clemens G. Meyer

Released on March 23, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requirements: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
